variables.$fxv#0:
<policies>
    <inbound>
        <base />

        <!-- Set the backend and auth-->
        <authentication-managed-identity resource="https://cognitiveservices.azure.com" client-id="{{managed-identity-client-id}}" />
        
        <!-- Extract deployment name from URL path -->
        <set-variable name="deploymentName" value="@{
            string deploymentName = "N/A";
            
            try
            {
                // Extract deployment name from URL path
                // Format: /openai/deployments/{deployment-id}/...
                var path = context.Request.Url.Path;
                var segments = path.Split(new[] { '/' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);
                
                for (int i = 0; i < segments.Length - 1; i++)
                {
                    if (segments[i] == "deployments")
                    {
                        deploymentName = System.Uri.UnescapeDataString(segments[i + 1]);
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
            catch { }
            
            return deploymentName;
        }" />
        
        <!-- Set backend pool using deployment name with dots replaced by '-dot-' and spaces removed -->
        <set-variable name="backendId" value="@{
            var deployment = (string)context.Variables["deploymentName"];
            return deployment == "N/A" ? "aoai-default-backend" : "pool-aoai-" + deployment.Replace(".", "-dot-").Replace(" ", "");
        }" />
        
        <set-backend-service id="apim-generated-policy" backend-id="@((string)context.Variables["backendId"])" />

        <!-- Check if streaming is enabled and inject stream_options -->
        <choose>
            <when condition="@(context.Request.Body.As<JObject>(preserveContent: true)?["stream"]?.Value<bool>() == true)">
                <!-- Streaming is enabled - inject stream_options to include usage -->
                <set-body>@{
                    var body = context.Request.Body.As<JObject>(preserveContent: true);
                    
                    // Add stream_options with include_usage: true
                    if (body["stream_options"] == null)
                    {
                        body["stream_options"] = new JObject();
                    }
                    ((JObject)body["stream_options"])["include_usage"] = true;
                    
                    return body.ToString();
                }</set-body>
            </when>
        </choose>
        
        <!-- Store whether this is a streaming request for later use -->
        <set-variable name="isStreaming" value="@(context.Request.Body.As<JObject>(preserveContent: true)?["stream"]?.Value<bool>() == true)" />
        
        <!-- Capture start time for response time calculation -->
        <set-variable name="requestStartTime" value="@(DateTime.UtcNow)" />
    </inbound>
    
    <backend>
        <base />
    </backend>
    
    <outbound>
        <base />
        
        <!-- Calculate response time -->
        <set-variable name="responseTime" value="@{
            var startTime = (DateTime)context.Variables["requestStartTime"];
            return (DateTime.UtcNow - startTime).TotalMilliseconds;
        }" />
        
        <!-- Parse usage tokens for non-streaming requests -->
        <choose>
            <when condition="@(!(bool)context.Variables["isStreaming"])">
                <set-variable name="responseBody" value="@(context.Response.Body.As<string>(preserveContent: true))" />
                <set-variable name="promptTokens" value="@{
                    var responseBodyStr = (string)context.Variables["responseBody"];
                    try {
                        var body = JObject.Parse(responseBodyStr);
                        return body?["usage"]?["prompt_tokens"]?.Value<double>() ?? 0.0;
                    } catch { return 0.0; }
                }" />
                <set-variable name="completionTokens" value="@{
                    var responseBodyStr = (string)context.Variables["responseBody"];
                    try {
                        var body = JObject.Parse(responseBodyStr);
                        return body?["usage"]?["completion_tokens"]?.Value<double>() ?? 0.0;
                    } catch { return 0.0; }
                }" />
                <set-variable name="totalTokens" value="@{
                    var responseBodyStr = (string)context.Variables["responseBody"];
                    try {
                        var body = JObject.Parse(responseBodyStr);
                        return body?["usage"]?["total_tokens"]?.Value<double>() ?? 0.0;
                    } catch { return 0.0; }
                }" />
            </when>
            <otherwise>
                <!-- Streaming - no token data available -->
                <set-variable name="promptTokens" value="@(0.0)" />
                <set-variable name="completionTokens" value="@(0.0)" />
                <set-variable name="totalTokens" value="@(0.0)" />
            </otherwise>
        </choose>
        
        <!-- Emit metrics to Application Insights -->
        <emit-metric name="azure-openai-emit-token-metric" value="1" namespace="OpenAI">
            <dimension name="Model" value="@((string)context.Variables["deploymentName"])" />
            <dimension name="Streaming" value="@(((bool)context.Variables["isStreaming"]).ToString())" />
            <dimension name="TotalTokens" value="@(((double)context.Variables["totalTokens"]).ToString())" />
            <dimension name="ResponseTimeMs" value="@(((double)context.Variables["responseTime"]).ToString())" />
        </emit-metric>
    </outbound>
    
    <on-error>
        <base />
        <trace source="AIUsageCapture" severity="error">@{
            return string.Format("Error capturing AI usage: {0}", context.LastError.Message);
        }</trace>
    </on-error>
</policies>
variables.$fxv#1:
<policies>
    <inbound>
        <base />

        <!-- Set the backend and auth-->
        <authentication-managed-identity resource="https://cognitiveservices.azure.com" client-id="{{managed-identity-client-id}}" />
        
        <!-- Extract deployment name from request body -->
        <set-variable name="deploymentName" value="@{
            string deploymentName = "N/A";
            
            try
            {
                // Extract model/deployment name from request body
                // Format: { "model": "deployment-name", ... }
                var body = context.Request.Body.As<JObject>(preserveContent: true);
                if (body != null && body["model"] != null)
                {
                    deploymentName = body["model"].Value<string>();
                }
            }
            catch { }
            
            return deploymentName;
        }" />
        
        <!-- Set backend pool using deployment name with dots replaced by '-dot-' -->
        <set-variable name="backendId" value="@{
            var deployment = (string)context.Variables["deploymentName"];
            return deployment == "N/A" ? "aoai-default-backend" : "pool-oaiv1-" + deployment.Replace(".", "-dot-");
        }" />
        
        <set-backend-service id="apim-generated-policy" backend-id="@((string)context.Variables["backendId"])" />

        <!-- Check if streaming is enabled and inject stream_options -->
        <choose>
            <when condition="@(context.Request.Body.As<JObject>(preserveContent: true)?["stream"]?.Value<bool>() == true)">
                <!-- Streaming is enabled - inject stream_options to include usage -->
                <set-body>@{
                    var body = context.Request.Body.As<JObject>(preserveContent: true);
                    
                    // Add stream_options with include_usage: true
                    if (body["stream_options"] == null)
                    {
                        body["stream_options"] = new JObject();
                    }
                    ((JObject)body["stream_options"])["include_usage"] = true;
                    
                    return body.ToString();
                }</set-body>
            </when>
        </choose>
        
        <!-- Store whether this is a streaming request for later use -->
        <set-variable name="isStreaming" value="@(context.Request.Body.As<JObject>(preserveContent: true)?["stream"]?.Value<bool>() == true)" />
        
        <!-- Capture start time for response time calculation -->
        <set-variable name="requestStartTime" value="@(DateTime.UtcNow)" />
    </inbound>
    
    <backend>
        <base />
    </backend>
    
    <outbound>
        <base />
        
        <!-- Calculate response time -->
        <set-variable name="responseTime" value="@{
            var startTime = (DateTime)context.Variables["requestStartTime"];
            return (DateTime.UtcNow - startTime).TotalMilliseconds;
        }" />
        
        <!-- Parse usage tokens for non-streaming requests -->
        <choose>
            <when condition="@(!(bool)context.Variables["isStreaming"])">
                <set-variable name="responseBody" value="@(context.Response.Body.As<string>(preserveContent: true))" />
                <set-variable name="promptTokens" value="@{
                    var responseBodyStr = (string)context.Variables["responseBody"];
                    try {
                        var body = JObject.Parse(responseBodyStr);
                        return body?["usage"]?["prompt_tokens"]?.Value<double>() ?? 0.0;
                    } catch { return 0.0; }
                }" />
                <set-variable name="completionTokens" value="@{
                    var responseBodyStr = (string)context.Variables["responseBody"];
                    try {
                        var body = JObject.Parse(responseBodyStr);
                        return body?["usage"]?["completion_tokens"]?.Value<double>() ?? 0.0;
                    } catch { return 0.0; }
                }" />
                <set-variable name="totalTokens" value="@{
                    var responseBodyStr = (string)context.Variables["responseBody"];
                    try {
                        var body = JObject.Parse(responseBodyStr);
                        return body?["usage"]?["total_tokens"]?.Value<double>() ?? 0.0;
                    } catch { return 0.0; }
                }" />
            </when>
            <otherwise>
                <!-- Streaming - no token data available -->
                <set-variable name="promptTokens" value="@(0.0)" />
                <set-variable name="completionTokens" value="@(0.0)" />
                <set-variable name="totalTokens" value="@(0.0)" />
            </otherwise>
        </choose>
        
        <!-- Emit metrics to Application Insights -->
        <emit-metric name="azure-openai-emit-token-metric" value="1" namespace="OpenAI">
            <dimension name="Model" value="@((string)context.Variables["modelName"])" />
            <dimension name="Streaming" value="@(((bool)context.Variables["isStreaming"]).ToString())" />
            <dimension name="PromptTokens" value="@(((double)context.Variables["promptTokens"]).ToString())" />
            <dimension name="CompletionTokens" value="@(((double)context.Variables["completionTokens"]).ToString())" />
            <dimension name="TotalTokens" value="@(((double)context.Variables["totalTokens"]).ToString())" />
            <dimension name="ResponseTimeMs" value="@(((double)context.Variables["responseTime"]).ToString())" />
        </emit-metric>
    </outbound>
    
    <on-error>
        <base />
        <trace source="AIUsageCapture" severity="error">@{
            return string.Format("Error capturing AI usage: {0}", context.LastError.Message);
        }</trace>
    </on-error>
</policies>
